content: Vouchers are valid up to 3 months after booking; it cannot be used with other coupons
Vouchers are non-refundable and non-transferrable; resale is not allowed; you may be refused entry if your ticket is found to be transferred or resold
Free admission for Japanese Junior high school students: bring proof of age, e.g., student ID
Overseas visitors under 15 years old need to show proof of age, e.g., passport
